Sentencas: Rail transportation is preferred as a cost-effective means of transferring passengers and goods between distant cities and countries.
Titulo: Development and assessment of a unique hybridized gas turbine locomotive engine operated by sustainable fuel blends

Sentencas: However, it relies on fossil fuels and produces a significant amount of carbon emissions.
Titulo: Development and assessment of a unique hybridized gas turbine locomotive engine operated by sustainable fuel blends

Sentencas: This paper presents a new hybrid locomotive engine consisting of a gas turbine engine, a direct solid oxide fuel cell, a high-temperature proton exchange membrane fuel cell, and an energy recovery system consisting of a refrig-eration system and electrothermal generators.
Titulo: Development and assessment of a unique hybridized gas turbine locomotive engine operated by sustainable fuel blends

Sentencas: This newly-designed engine is investigated using thermodynamic analysis to assess its performance with five different sustainable hydrogen-base fuel blends.
Titulo: Development and assessment of a unique hybridized gas turbine locomotive engine operated by sustainable fuel blends

Sentencas: The hybrid engine can produce an average total power of 5911 kW with a thermal efficiency of 75% compared to 2248 kW from a gas-only turbine engine.
Titulo: Development and assessment of a unique hybridized gas turbine locomotive engine operated by sustainable fuel blends

Sentencas: The maximum performance can be obtained using a 75% methanol and 25% hydrogen blend to deliver 6 MW with energetic and exergetic efficiencies of 79% and 49%, respectively.
Titulo: Development and assessment of a unique hybridized gas turbine locomotive engine operated by sustainable fuel blends

Sentencas: In addition, carbon emissions are reduced by more than 80% using these fuel blends.
Titulo: Development and assessment of a unique hybridized gas turbine locomotive engine operated by sustainable fuel blends

Sentencas: Furthermore, the energy recovery system can convert 20% of the waste energy into electric and cooling energy.
Titulo: Development and assessment of a unique hybridized gas turbine locomotive engine operated by sustainable fuel blends

Sentencas: Moreover, the proposed study provides an environmentally friendly engine system with high performance which is potentially suitable to replace the traditional locomotive engines.
Titulo: Development and assessment of a unique hybridized gas turbine locomotive engine operated by sustainable fuel blends
